about.name: Manuel Alférez
about.description: I'm a software developer and an open source enthusiast based in Spain. I also have experience organizing events for over +300 people. You'll often find me playing chess, venturing out for hikes, and running half-marathons.

offer.title: What I can do for you

list.title: Customized Digital Solutions
list.description: I'll study your product and your target audience thoroughly to create the best digital solution for your business

list.title: Project upgrade
list.description: Do you already have a project? No problem, I can enhance it to attract new leads and increase your revenue

list.title: E-commerce
list.description: From e-commerce platforms to interactive applications, and I can seamlessly integrate Stripe payments for your business

projects.title: Featured projects
projects.subtitle: Here are some of my latest projects that I'm proud of

list.title: Flowinance
list.description: Managing your money is now easier than ever. Visualize your budget in a quick and easy way.

list.title: Chatcus
list.description: A real-time chat application where use can create rooms and chat with other users.

list.title: PicLab
list.description: Landing page for a company specializing in image asset management (just frontend).

list.title: Practice Aptis B1
list.description: Exercises to practice the B1 of the Aptis test.

list.title: Adasstra
list.description: An NGO providing support to those in need, allowing donors to contribute funds and witness the impact of their contributions through a dedicated blog.

list.title: Blog
list.description: Showcase of a personal website with a blog section connected to Prismic CMS.

list.title: Checklist App
list.description: A simple checklist app to keep track of your daily tasks.

list.title: Cat facts
list.description: Webpage that shows facts about cats through the API provider.

resume.title: Resume
resume.subtitle: Explore my resume where, just like in chess ♟️, every move counts

achievements: Improved user experience in bots by creating custom visual message components, resulting in over +36M meaningful interactions and a significant improvement in the user experience.
Implemented an internal plugin able to generate chatbots from a backend-supplied flow, and reporting directly to the CTO on the progress and success of the project.
Facilitated interactive software training sessions for customers, encompassing both the basics of product knowledge and advanced technical aspects of bots specifically for developers.
Events: Supporting the community to organize events of 300 people.
Speaker: Being speaker in 3 events about: Google Cloud, React.js and Open Source with Git & Github.
Community size: Leading a team of 8 volunteers to create a community of 900+ people.

list.items: TypeScript, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, C/C++, Bash, Markdown
React.js, Next.js, Tailwind CSS, Rechart, Node.js, Socket.IO, Express.js
Git, GitHub, Vercel, AWS, Supabase, Contentful, Google Cloud, Prismic, Firebase, Heroku, Figma

contact.subtitle: Want to get in touch? I'll get back to you within a day
